name: Greg The Space Shark
description:
Created for the 2021 U of M CSSA game jam!

A strange race of water aliens have invaded the planet and stolen all of earth's water! Young Greg must venture where no shark has gone before to fend off the evil aliens and return the water to the oceans!

Game Created By:

  • Jared Webber
  • Mia Battad
  • Graham Downey
  • Terra
  • Kunal
